buginformation.summary: 818 error time series create copy method
buginformation.description: the test case the end fails with java lang illegal argument exception requires start end the problem that the int start and end indexes corresponding given time period are computed incorectly here would expect empty serie returned not exception this with jfreechart public class foo static public void main string args time series foo new time series foo day class foo add new day 2005 foo add new day 2005 foo add new day 2005 foo add new day 2005 foo add new day 2005 foo add new day 2005 foo add new day 2005 foo add new day 2006 try time series bar foo create copy new day 2005 new day 2006 catch clone not supported exception print stack trace
